import React from "react"; export const VivoNex = { slug: 'vivo-nex', name: 'Vivo Nex', client: 'Freeman / Vivo', cover: '/media/projects/VivoNex/cover.jpg', components: 'Sensors, Projection', type: 'Product Launch', location: 'Shanghai, China', title: 'Facing the Black Mirror', summary: 'Vivo launched its new series “VIVO NEX” and a unique selling point will no doubt be its revolutionary dual display screen. We decided to use this as our main focus and worked with our agency partner, Freeman and a digital artist to create a “Magic Mirror” interactive. Furthermore, we designed a special photo filter effects application and a digital artwork installation.', body: ( <>

The experience flow of guests begins as soon as they walk in front of the mirror. A beam of light will then cast above them and a message will appear in the mirror. These messages serve as reminders for guests to embrace and love themselves.

For the 3 days event in 2 cities, we had more than 1000 guests who attended and interacted with our digital art installation.

) }
